short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finally an adblocker that is safe and secure. Only does what it's supposed to do, not a bit less and not a bit more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Safe adblocker makes your online experience smooth and interruption free. You can disable and enable the plugin conveniently by clicking on the extension icon. Blocking ads has never been easier. Does not listen to your traffic, no extra piece of code, safe and simple.
Enjoy surfing youtube, facebook, cnn, forbes, and many other websites ad free.
